Whenever a Hero appears, they remain for a set number of turns before their time is up and they naturally expire. After a Hero is gone, however, their claiming civilization can recall them by spending Faith.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each of the twelve Heroes has their own special powers and distinct role. In the hands of a wise player, the right Hero can truly be a game-changing force!
